problems.description: Ensures <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text
problems.help: <svg> elements with an img role must have an alternative text

problems.description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
problems.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

problems.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
problems.help: tables should not have the same summary and caption

problems.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
problems.help: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

problems.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
problems.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

problems.description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values
problems.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

problems.description: Ensures <video> elements have captions
problems.help: <video> elements must have captions

problems.description: Ensures <video> or <audio> elements do not autoplay audio for more than 3 seconds without a control mechanism to stop or mute the audio
problems.help: <video> or <audio> elements must not play automatically

problems.description: s role"[39m,
problems.help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes

problems.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
problems.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

problems.description: true
problems.help: true

problems.description: Ensures aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements
problems.help: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

problems.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
problems.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

problems.description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
problems.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

problems.description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values
problems.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

problems.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
problems.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

problems.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
problems.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

problems.description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
problems.help: Buttons must have discernible text

problems.description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
problems.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

problems.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
problems.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

problems.description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
problems.help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

problems.description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique
problems.help: id attribute value must be unique

problems.description: Ensures headings have discernible text
problems.help: Headings should not be empty

problems.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
problems.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

problems.description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
problems.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

problems.description: Ensures the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value
problems.help: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

problems.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
problems.help: Images must have alternate text

problems.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
problems.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

problems.description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level
problems.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

problems.description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level
problems.help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

problems.description: Ensures the main landmark is at top level
problems.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

problems.description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark
problems.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

problems.description: Ensures the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
problems.help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

problems.description: Ensures the document has at most one main landmark
problems.help: Document should not have more than one main landmark

problems.description: Ensures the document has a main landmark
problems.help: Document should have one main landmark
Ensures landmarks are unique

problems.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
problems.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

problems.description: Ensures links have discernible text
problems.help: Links must have discernible text

problems.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
problems.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

problems.description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically
problems.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

problems.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount
problems.help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

problems.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
problems.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

problems.description: Ensures interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
problems.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

problems.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
problems.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

problems.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
problems.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

problems.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
problems.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

problems.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
problems.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

problems.description: Ensures headings have discernible text
problems.help: Headings should not be empty

problems.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
problems.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

problems.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
problems.help: Images must have alternate text

problems.description: Ensures links have discernible text
problems.help: Links must have discernible text
